title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: Get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models from Python.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node & browsers; same features as Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLM/Chat/Embeddings.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, RAG, multi-user).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper with chat history, prompt templates, and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-like VS Code extension backed by Ollama models.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama with fluent API and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem to chat and manage models via Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset to use Ollama models in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community cookbook with examples: function calling, voice chat, Discord bot, etc.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker Compose stacks for CPU & GPU (CUDA, ROCm) deployments.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Tauri-based desktop GUI for chatting with Ollama.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal retrieval-augmented generation example using Ollama & Chroma.
